items.name: Borno Barnyard Friends
items.short_description: An interactive farm experience where children can meet and feed friendly animals, learn about local agriculture, and enjoy pony rides.
items.address: Off Ngala Road, near Maiduguri-Gamboru Highway, Maiduguri, Borno State

items.name: Maiduguri Junior Sports Hub
items.short_description: A dedicated mini sports complex offering scaled-down pitches for football, basketball courts, and basic track & field areas for young aspiring athletes.
items.address: Sir Kashim Ibrahim Way, opposite Government House, Maiduguri, Borno State

items.name: Maiduguri Kid's Adventure Oasis
items.short_description: A sprawling playground with modern equipment, climbing structures, and safe adventure zones for children of all ages.
items.address: Damboa Road, near Federal Low Cost Housing Estate, Maiduguri, Borno State

items.name: The Wandering Wonders Puppet Show
items.short_description: A lively mobile puppet theater and occasional mini-circus acts featuring traditional Nigerian stories and captivating performances for all ages.
items.address: Various locations, check schedule at Customs Area, Maiduguri, Borno State (main office)
